record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - October 15, 2007)

[Page: H11533]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, the rules of the House do not allow me to remove myself from cosponsor at this time of H.R. 811, but this statement serves that I am not to be perceived as a cosponsor of this bill at this time.
